typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Agentid as integer,
		Name as string,
		Designation as string,
		Contactno as integer,
		Location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BlobDource
source(output(
		maxkey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(scdkey) as maxkey from\ndbo.dim_agent',
	format: 'query') ~> Maxkey
source(output(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Targetref
BlobDource select(mapColumn(
		Src_Agentid = Agentid,
		Src_Name = Name,
		Src_Designation = Designation,
		Src_Contactno = Contactno,
		Src_Location = Location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Maxkey join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CrossJoin
CrossJoin, Targetref join(Src_Agentid == Agentid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 split(Src_Agentid==Agentid,
	disjoint: false) ~> Checkmatch@(Match, UnMatch)
Checkmatch@Match, Targetref join(Src_Designation == Targetref@Desination,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'right')~> Join2
Join2 split(Src_Designation==Checkmatch@Match@Desination,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DesigMatch, DesigUnmatch)
ConditionalSplit1@DesigMatch alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@DesigUnmatch derive(IsActive = 0,
		todate = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(ConditionalSplit1@DesigUnmatch@scdkey<=maxkey && IsActive != 0   )) ~> AlterRow2
Checkmatch@UnMatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Agentid = Src_Agentid,
		Agentname = Src_Name,
		Desination = Src_Designation,
		contactno = Src_Contactno,
		Location = Src_Location
	)) ~> InsertTarget
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Agentid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Agentid = Src_Agentid,
		contactno = Src_Contactno,
		Location = Src_Location
	)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@DesigUnmatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Agentid = Src_Agentid,
		Agentname = Src_Name,
		Desination = Src_Designation,
		contactno = Src_Contactno,
		Location = Src_Location
	)) ~> sink2
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Agentid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Agentid = Src_Agentid,
		IsActive,
		todate
	)) ~> sink3
